document_data.name: Droth
document_data.mainbody: '''Droth''' was a mercenary formerly in service to the [[Cult of the Howling Hatred]] at [[Tyar-Besil]] during the [[Elemental Evil]] crisis.
document_data.History: In [[1491 DR]], Droth was hired by the Howling Hatred. However, during a skirmish with the [[Cult of the Black Earth]], he was injured and captured. He remained catatonic in the [[Temple of the Black Earth]]'s jail until some adventurers defeated the cultist jailers.
